title: [Large-scale] Federated Learning Design and Functional In-Depth Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic machine learning concepts, understanding of distributed systems, and foundational data privacy knowledge
context.additional_context: Course for specialized learners in medical/legal/technical fields to analyze practical applications of federated learning in VR-based simulation environments

learning_goals: Explain and apply the core functions of federated learning (client selection, aggregation, knowledge transfer) in real-world scenarios
Identify potential issues in federated learning design under non-IID data environments and propose solutions
Implement federated learning architectures reflecting privacy requirements in medical/legal/technical domains within simulation environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
